data.description: The scope of the Device Manegement architecture document is to define the architecture for the Device Management v1.3 enabler. This document fulfils the functional capabilities and information flows needed to support this enabler as described in the Device Management requirements document [DM-RD].

The scope of the Device Management architecture document is to define the architecture for the Device Management v2.0 enabler. This document fulfils the functional capabilities and information flows needed to support this enabler as described in the Device Management requirements document [DM-RD].

The scope of this document is limited to the Enabler Release Definition of OMA Device Management v2.0 according to OMA Release process and the Enabler Release specification baseline listed in section 5.

This document contains use cases and requirements for Device Management 1.3. It describes a set of enhanced or new functional requirements for the management of a Device. These functional requirements will maintain the backward compatibility with DM 1.2.

This document contains use cases and requirements for OMA Device Management version 2.0. It describes a set of enhanced and new functional requirements for the management of a Device.  DM 2.0 is the next major release of OMAâ€™s protocol for remote management of Devices.  Being a major release of the OMA-DM protocol, backward compatibility with DM 1.2 and other minor releases under DM 1.0 is not assured.
